marklogic.body:
Cool thing for Mrs Palin to put on her resume! Maybe she can warm over some of the Cold liberal day show watchers. She's never had a fair shake from people who are only exposed to the liberal media. NBC might be making a mistake here if they want to keep the propaganda going.
We have two radio stations owned by the same conglomerate in the SF bay area. One has been left leaning (to different degrees) and the other has Always been right leaning (Rush/Hannity/Lavin type).
In the beginning of the year they had a remake on both stations. The conservative station included more local talent (Melanie Morgan is back YEA!) but remains conservative. The Liberal station (called the "News" station) has reconstructed their talents to include about 1/2 of the show talents being conservative.
I think media realizing that in order to survive, they have to start serving the majority of their potential audience and put on some conservative talent.

object.displayName: Comment on Exclusive - Palin to Couric: 'Game On' by Billyb9

marklogic.displayName: Billyb9 commented on Exclusive - Palin to Couric: 'Game On'
